synopsis.text: Demon-tainted and sword in hand, a young man named Jinta embarks on a time-traversing quest in this epic Japanese fantasy series. In the quaint mountain village of Kadono, nestled in the Edo period, Jinta serves as the protector of the revered shrine maiden, Itsukihime. One fateful day, he encounters a cryptic demon in the forest, who prophesizes the rise of a Demon God in the distant future, with roots tracing back to the very village Jinta is sworn to protect. As the centuries unfold, Jinta grapples with the purpose of wielding his sword, while seeking justice for his losses and a reason to persevere through the ages. The first episode of this grand adventure clocks in at approximately one hour.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
